parameters.name: EndDate
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

The default value is the day when you perform the operation.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: StartDate
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

You can query only the DNS records of the last 90 days. `The value of StartDate must be greater than or equal to the difference between the current date and 90`.
